name: Into West Bali for nature, culture and relaxation
description: As Bali has become overwhelmed with big hotels and the crowd. This tour is a 2 day escape to West Bali. This is a one of a kind tour with me to my province. West Bali is still unknown area, you won't find it in Lonely Planet. You will visit temples, national parks, waterfalls, be invited to villages where no other tourists go.
